content:
Hello,
I saw that you might need some extra hands and I would like to try to help. My name is Huw and I have been following Rust for about a year or so. I work as a software development manager by day but can offer you some of my free time. I am not sure what I could do to help but you can review the Rust code I have written to give yourself an idea of what might be appropriate. I wrote a wrapper around the Oracle OCI libary https://github.com/huwwynnjones/oci_rs. I have not worked on any other part of the Rust project. Let me know if/what you need and if there is any primer documentation that would be worth me reading first.
Thanks
Huw

:wave: Hi @Huw Wynn-Jones =)

We're actually doing pretty good right now, we don't have that many tasks at present, but I'll definitely ping you if something comes up (and/or try to review some of the issues and maybe find a lower priority one that we had shelved)
If you are more generally interested in compiler development there are plenty of other tasks that need doing :slight_smile:
Yes, I would be. If you can tell me where I should go to see the tasks then I take a look and start to find somewhere to help. Thanks
Yes, I would be. If you can tell me where I should go to see the tasks then I take a look and start to find somewhere to help. Thanks
I worked it out now and found the rustc book and the issues list, I will go from there.

@Huw Wynn-Jones Here are some issues to consider: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/57883, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/58713, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/54503, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/51992, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/47809 :slight_smile:
